name: Za’atar-Spiced Zucchini
description: Za’atar, a Middle Eastern spice mix made from dried thyme, sumac, and sesame seeds, gives this grilled zucchini a fragrant and herbal twist.
keywords: olive oil, za’atar, zucchini, side dish, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a charcoal or gas grill; the fire should be medium-low and the rack about 4 inches from the heat.
Stir 1/4 cup za’atar and 2 tablespoons olive oil into a paste; season with salt and pepper.
Rub zucchini with za’atar and grill, turning once, until nicely browned and tender, 6 to 8 minutes. Garnish with parsley.
